info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 6:13PM CDT until May 15 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLEVELAND...DESHA...NORTHERN DREW...SOUTHWESTERN LINCOLN AND SOUTHEASTERN ARKANSAS COUNTIES... At 613 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Crumrod to near Omega to Brandon, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dumas... Rohwer... Mitchellville... Tillar... Watson... Winchester... Yancopin... Omega... Plantersville... Mills... Merrisach Lake... Kelso... Brandon... Trusten Holder WMA... Reed... Arkansas Post... Garrett Bridge... Gourd... Florence... Tyro... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
